# GitHub Topics for Better Discovery

This file lists recommended topics for this repository. Add these topics in GitHub repository settings for better discoverability.

## Recommended Topics

- telegram-bot
- whoop-api
- health-tracking
- personal-assistant
- nlp
- productivity
- fitness
- wellness
- ai-assistant
- llm
- openrouter
- deepseek
- self-improvement
- habit-tracking
- mindfulness
- python
- aiogram
- apscheduler
- subconscious-programming
- daily-routine
- fitness-tracker
- wellness-bot

## How to Add Topics

1. Go to your repository on GitHub
2. Click on the gear icon (⚙️) next to "About"
3. In the "Topics" field, add the topics listed above
4. Press Enter after each topic
5. Click "Save changes"

These topics will help users discover your repository when searching for related projects.
